00052 #ifndef _YOUBOT_SLAVE_MAILBOX_MESSAGE_H
00053 #define _YOUBOT_SLAVE_MAILBOX_MESSAGE_H
00054 
00055 #include <ethercattype.h>
00056 #include <string>
00057 #include <time.h>
00058 
00059 namespace youbot {
00060   ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00061   /// EtherCat mailbox message of the youBot EtherCat slaves
00062   ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00063   class YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg {
00064   public:
00065 
00066     /// Output part from the EtherCat mailbox message of the youBot EtherCat slaves
00067     struct mailboxOutputBuffer {
00068       uint8 moduleAddress; //0 = Drive  1 = Gripper
00069       uint8 commandNumber;
00070       uint8 typeNumber;
00071       uint8 motorNumber; //always zero
00072       uint32 value; //MSB first!
00073     } __attribute__((__packed__));
00074 
00075     /// Input part from the EtherCat mailbox message of the youBot EtherCat slaves
00076     struct mailboxInputBuffer {
00077       uint8 replyAddress;
00078       uint8 moduleAddress;
00079       uint8 status; //(e.g. 100 means “no error”)
00080       uint8 commandNumber;
00081       uint32 value; //MSB first!
00082     } __attribute__((__packed__));
00083 
00084     mailboxOutputBuffer stctOutput;
00085     mailboxInputBuffer stctInput;
00086 
00087     // Constructor
00088 
00089     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg() {
00090       stctOutput.moduleAddress = 0;
00091       stctOutput.commandNumber = 0;
00092       stctOutput.typeNumber = 0;
00093       stctOutput.motorNumber = 0;
00094       stctOutput.value = 0;
00095 
00096       stctInput.replyAddress = 0;
00097       stctInput.moduleAddress = 0;
00098       stctInput.status = 0;
00099       stctInput.commandNumber = 0;
00100       stctInput.value = 0;
00101       slaveNumber = 1000;
00102     }
00103 
00104     // Constructor
00105 
00106     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg(unsigned int slaveNo) {
00107       stctOutput.moduleAddress = 0;
00108       stctOutput.commandNumber = 0;
00109       stctOutput.typeNumber = 0;
00110       stctOutput.motorNumber = 0;
00111       stctOutput.value = 0;
00112 
00113       stctInput.replyAddress = 0;
00114       stctInput.moduleAddress = 0;
00115       stctInput.status = 0;
00116       stctInput.commandNumber = 0;
00117       stctInput.value = 0;
00118       slaveNumber = slaveNo;
00119 
00120     }
00121 
00122 
00123 
00124     // Copy-Constructor
00125 
00126     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg(const YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg& copy) {
00127       stctOutput = copy.stctOutput;
00128       stctInput = copy.stctInput;
00129       slaveNumber = copy.slaveNumber;
00130       parameterName = copy.parameterName;
00131     }
00132 
00133     // Destructor
00134 
00135     ~YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg() {
00136     }
00137 
00138     // assignment operator
00139 
00140     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg & operator=(const YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg& copy) {
00141       stctOutput = copy.stctOutput;
00142       stctInput = copy.stctInput;
00143       slaveNumber = copy.slaveNumber;
00144       parameterName = copy.parameterName;
00145 
00146       return *this;
00147     }
00148 
00149     std::string parameterName;
00150 
00151     unsigned int getSlaveNo() const {
00152       return slaveNumber;
00153     }
00154   private:
00155     unsigned int slaveNumber;
00156   };
00157 
00158 } // namespace youbot
00159 
00160 #endif  /* _YOUBOT_SLAVE_MESSAGE_H */
